[laughter]
CHUCK: So it’s been a while since you've been in the show Aaron, do you wanna just quickly introduce yourself for the handful of folks that haven’t seen you speak at the myriad conference you’d been to?
AARON: Sure. My name is Aaron Paterson. I work on the Rails Core Team and the Ruby Core Team and I tweet as “tenderlove”. I don’t know what else to say about myself. How's that?

CHUCK: [laughs]

AARON: …intentionally so that nobody can understand what I'm saying.
